item.title: Thought: Two Reasons Why Software Is Difficult to Use
item.description: I don’t have much trust in software. If I can help, I avoid using software. I prefer to walk to the bank than to use online banking. Same for doing government paperworks. Software most of the time doesn’t work, or at least, doesn’t work the way I expect. I think the main reasons why using software is confusing, when compared to other domains, are two things: the lack of locality and the lack of observability.
